00022 TEST(BasicTests, RandomUniformBasic) {
00023 
00024     // System sys;
00025 
00026     SystemPtr sys(new System);
00027 
00028     RandomUniform a(sys); 
00029 
00030     // EXPECT_EQ(a.getName(), "RandomUniform");
00031 
00032 
00033     // these names are simply numerical codes for reference
00034     EXPECT_EQ(aw::pNameMinimum,  0);
00035     EXPECT_EQ(aw::pNameMaximum,  1);
00036 
00037 
00038     //Constant *gen1 = new Constant(sys); // create a constant generator
00039     ConstantPtr gen1(new Constant(sys));
00040     gen1->setParameter(aw::pNameValue, 0.0);
00041 
00042     //Constant *gen2 = new Constant(sys); // create a constant generator
00043     ConstantPtr gen2(new Constant(sys));
00044     gen2->setParameter(aw::pNameValue, 2.0);
00045     EXPECT_EQ(gen2->getValueAtSecond(0.0), 2);
00046 
00047     // this will be a trigger, set to constant 1, which means
00048     // new values are always made
00049     ConstantPtr gen3(new Constant(sys));
00050     gen3->setParameter(aw::pNameValue, 1);
00051 
00052 
00053     // set constants to min and max
00054     a.setParameter(aw::pNameMinimum, gen1);
00055     a.setParameter(aw::pNameMaximum, gen2);
00056     a.setParameter(aw::pNameRefresh, gen3, aw::pContextNameTrigger);
00057 
00058     EXPECT_EQ(a.getParameter(aw::pNameMinimum)->getName(), "Constant");
00059     EXPECT_EQ(a.getParameter(aw::pNameMaximum)->getName(), "Constant");
00060 
00061 
00062     // test getting the value of an embedded generator
00063     EXPECT_EQ(a.getParameter(aw::pNameMaximum)->getValueAtSecond(0), 2);
00064     EXPECT_EQ(a.getParameter(aw::pNameRefresh)->getValueAtSecond(0), 1);
00065 
00066     // values are between 0 and 2
00067     EXPECT_TRUE(a.getValueAtSample(0) >= 0.0);
00068     EXPECT_TRUE(a.getValueAtSample(0) <= 2.0);
00069 
00070     a.reset();
00071     a.printSample(10, 0); // display 10 sample outputs, b/n 0 and 1
00072     a.reset();
00073     a.printSample(10, 0); // display 10 sample outputs, b/n 0 and 1
00074 
00075     // try to set new values for embedded parameters
00076     gen1->setParameter(aw::pNameValue, 100.0);
00077     gen2->setParameter(aw::pNameValue, 200.0);
00078 
00079     // changes are reflected in output
00080     a.reset();
00081     EXPECT_TRUE(a.getValueAtSecond(0.0) >= 100.0);
00082     EXPECT_TRUE(a.getValueAtSecond(0.0) <= 200.0);
00083 
00084     // values should not repeat!
00085     float b = a.getValueAtSample(0);
00086     float c = a.getValueAtSample(1);
00087     float d = a.getValueAtSample(2);
00088 
00089     EXPECT_TRUE(b != c);
00090     EXPECT_TRUE(c != d);
00091 
00092 
00093     // display 10 sample outputs, b/n 100 and 200, at a refresh rate of 2s
00094     // gen3 is already controlly parameterReferesh
00095     gen3->setParameter(aw::pNameValue, 4);
00096     // need reassign to change context
00097     a.setParameter(aw::pNameRefresh, gen3, aw::pContextNamePeriodSeconds);
00098     EXPECT_EQ(a.getParameter(aw::pNameRefresh)->getValueAtSecond(0), 4);
00099     EXPECT_EQ(a.getContext(aw::pNameRefresh), 
00100         aw::pContextNamePeriodSeconds);
00101 
00102     // display output incremented in seconds
00103     a.reset();
00104     a.printSample(10, 0, 1, aw::timeContextNameSecond); 
00105 
00106     // try in increments of 1 second
00107     gen3->setParameter(aw::pNameValue, 2);
00108     a.reset();
00109     a.printSample(10, 0, 1, aw::timeContextNameSecond); 
00110 
00111 
00112 }

00120

00122

00124     gen1->setParameter(aw::pNameValue, 5.0);
00125 
00126     ConstantPtr gen2(new Constant(sys));
00127     gen2->setParameter(aw::pNameValue, 8.0);
00128 
00129     ConstantPtr gen3(new Constant(sys));
00130     gen3->setParameter(aw::pNameValue, 1);
00131 
00132 
00133     // set constants to min and max
00134     a.setParameter(aw::pNameMinimum, gen1);
00135     a.setParameter(aw::pNameMaximum, gen2);
00136     a.setParameter(aw::pNameRefresh, gen3, aw::pContextNameTrigger);
00137

00147 TEST(BasicTests, RandomUniformValidParameterContext) {
00148     // test getting the valid parameter context
00149 
00150     
00151     SystemPtr sys(new System(44100, 8));
00152     RandomUniform a(sys); 
00153 
00154     EXPECT_TRUE(a.isValidContext(aw::pNameMinimum,
00155         aw::pContextNameNone) == true);
00156     EXPECT_TRUE(a.isValidContext(aw::pNameMinimum,
00157         aw::pContextNameFrequency) == false);
00158     EXPECT_TRUE(a.isValidContext(aw::pNameRefresh,
00159         aw::pContextNameFrequency) == true);
00160     EXPECT_TRUE(a.isValidContext(aw::pNameRefresh,
00161         aw::pContextNamePeriodSeconds) == true);
00162     EXPECT_TRUE(a.isValidContext(aw::pNameRefresh,
00163         aw::pContextNameTrigger) == true);
00164     EXPECT_TRUE(a.isValidContext(aw::pNameRefresh,
00165         aw::pContextNameNone) == false);
00166 
00167     // if given none, an exception will be thrown
00168     ConstantPtr gen1(new Constant(sys));
00169     gen1->setParameter(aw::pNameValue, 5.0);
00170 
00171     ASSERT_THROW(a.setParameter(aw::pNameRefresh, gen1,
00172         aw::pContextNameNone), std::invalid_argument);
00173 
00174     // can assign if the proper context
00175     a.setParameter(aw::pNameRefresh, gen1, aw::pContextNamePeriodSeconds);
00176 }

00182 TEST(BasicTests, RandomUniformDefaults) {
00183 
00184     SystemPtr sys(new System(44100, 8));
00185 
00186     // defaults already configured
00187     RandomUniform gen1(sys); 
00188 
00189     EXPECT_EQ(gen1.getParameter(aw::pNameMinimum)->getValueAtSecond(0),
00190         0);
00191     EXPECT_EQ(gen1.getParameter(aw::pNameMaximum)->getValueAtSecond(0),
00192         1);
00193 
00194     EXPECT_EQ(gen1.getParameter(aw::pNameRefresh)->getValueAtSecond(0),
00195         1);
00196 
00197     EXPECT_TRUE(gen1.getValueAtSample(0) >= 0.0);
00198     EXPECT_TRUE(gen1.getValueAtSample(0) <= 1.0);
00199 
00200     gen1.setParameter(aw::pNameMaximum, 220.0);
00201     EXPECT_EQ(gen1.getParameter(aw::pNameMaximum)->getValueAtSecond(0),
00202         220);
00203 
00204 
00205     gen1.setParameter(aw::pNameMaximum, 5);
00206     EXPECT_EQ(gen1.getParameter(aw::pNameMaximum)->getValueAtSecond(0),
00207         5);
00208 
00209 
00210 
00211 }

00215 TEST(BasicTests, RandomUniformValidParameters) {
00216 
00217     SystemPtr sys(new System(44100, 8));
00218     RandomUniform gen1(sys); 
00219 
00220     EXPECT_EQ(gen1.isValidParameter(aw::pNameMaximum), true);
00221     EXPECT_EQ(gen1.isValidParameter(aw::pNameMinimum), true);
00222     EXPECT_EQ(gen1.isValidParameter(aw::pNameRefresh), true);
00223     EXPECT_EQ(gen1.isValidParameter(aw::pNameRate), false);
00224 
00225     // a bad argument for this generator will throw an exception
00226     ASSERT_THROW(gen1.setParameter(aw::pNameRate, .4,
00227         aw::pContextNamePeriodSamples), std::invalid_argument);
00228     
00229 }
